data.title: Manisha Koirala Talks About Her Marriage Plans
data.meta_description: Manisha Koirala has returned to the movies again. Making her comeback with Mauli, directed by debutante Promita Sengupta, the actress plays Bihari-Muslim woman who reunites with her lost son after years.
data.text:
Manisha Koirala has returned to the movies again. Making her comeback with Mauli, directed by debutante Promita Sengupta, the actress plays Bihari-Muslim woman who reunites with her lost son after years. In an interview to Mumbai Mirror, she opened up and spoke about the want to adopt a girl child –

I am extremely close to my family but they live in Nepal. I feel lonely when I come back to an empty house. There’s a need for human bonding, I’ve wanted to adopt since I was a child.

Manisha was married to Nepali businessman Samrat Dahal in 2010, but they filed for divorce, two years later. When asked if she’s open for a second marriage, Manisha was quite positive –

Who wouldn’t want to get married? Initially it’s great, but later, you never know. If somebody nice comes along, I may think about it. What’s important at present is a sense of family which will come with the adoption.

The actress plans to get into film-making and writing as well. We’re just glad to see her back!
